Reviews.Title: Handy and fun to use
Reviews.Author: anoopster
Reviews.Content: I'm no CCTV technician. We're upgrading our 16ch DVR and cameras and got tired of running back and forth from camera to DVR troubleshooting the install and communicating with someone at the dvr by cell phone while I adjusted cameras wasn't really working.  This is also our first time using PTZ cameras and I had no easy way of testing that out until I found this unit.This does what it says it does--view camera image, control PTZ, power camera, and test connections. The menu command is a bit clunky and I found that I could access the native camera controls and some I could not but that wasn't a problem. Storing the bundles of cables and adapters is a bit of a nuisance too.The only real fault in the design is the orange rubber protective case restricts access to the 12v power out port which was remedied by drilling out a larger hole in the rubber case. You would think they would have noticed this problem though.For the money it was worth it considering the investment I was making in my new DVR and cameras. It made installing the cameras sooooo much easier.  My old system lasted 8yrs and occasionally camera's would go out so I figure I'll need this unit to troubleshoot problems in the future.

Reviews.Title: Please with the purchase overall
Reviews.Author: doozer
Reviews.Content: Important to consider that once the rechargeable battery is dead, you won't be able to replace -- you'll have to run on power.  I found I wanted to be able to transmit color bars to set-up a monitor/tv, but you don't have the facility to do this.  The screen is great, the unit is easy to hold atop a ladder when you're setting up CCTV cams.  Please with the purchase overall.

Reviews.Title: Test Monitor
Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: Excellent monitor for the work I do.... Love the battery life very easy to work with on a ladder..... All around good tool to have on your truck.

Reviews.Title: Problems
Reviews.Author: Terry Shepherd
Reviews.Content: The unit looks good and would work well if I could read the screen. The language is Chinese when the screen pulls up. I found no way to change the language and the manual says to call the company for help with the unit but gives no phone number to call.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Stephen P. Schmitz
Reviews.Content: Great quality product, Very clear picture with awesome test capabilities, easy to use controls and menus. Comes with plenty needed accessories for different equipment. ( don't forget to plug in the battery when you get it, you will have to open the battery compartment)

Reviews.Title: Much needed CCTV tool for not much money ..
Reviews.Author: Maui Tech Guru
Reviews.Content: I'd been looking for a tester for a while and when I found this it was a no-brainer because it really does a lot for little money. It's not a spendy high-end tester but for what we need it's just perfect as it does a bunch of things. I mostly like that it's rechargeable, that it powers 12VDC cameras so you can power/view a cam while on the ladder. It's been reliable so far; and it comes with a protective case, and a nice bag so it won't get smashed in the toolbox.

Reviews.Title: Unit is ALOT better than the one we have been using.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Mott
Reviews.Content: The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the fact that the battery had not been plugged in prior to shipping, leading me to believe that the unit was defective (Would only turn on while plugged in)Once that was straightened out, the unit is perfect. I love the fact that it doesn't need to use 6- AA batteries that barely get me through a week. Havent had a chance to see how long the battery will last yet.Pros-Screen is large and looks greatUnit is very easy to useSetting allows you to pick how long the unit will stay on for before automatically turning off (5M, 10M, 20m, ETC)Built in batteryRubber caseCons-Battery charging duration is a bit much (If you plan ahead you'll be fine)Rubber case makes the unit rather bulky (I really don't mind that much just pointing it out)Storage case is made from low quality materials

Reviews.Title: SAVED MY BUTT and time and money!! awesome product fast shipping
Reviews.Author: joel "JAZZY JOEL PRODUCTIONS "Quality eve...
Reviews.Content: quality, fast, will order again /// pro awesome super fast shipping great price to quality ratio. JJP will use again ...Only issue is on the viewer screen i can not remove the setting options so the little screen is cluttered with data and its hard to get a clear image from camera/ video feed do to the text on the screen ... but oh well works well for the price.

Reviews.Title: 3.5" LCD CCTV Speed Dome Controller & Test Monitor
Reviews.Author: Maurice H. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and worked very well for project i was working on (CCTV Camera). It was much easier to pan/tilt cameras before final installment.

Reviews.Title: CCTV Tester
Reviews.Author: Anson King
Reviews.Content: This is a very useful product when you are an installer of surveillance system especially when you are installing 8 ch system and over. This product have saved me a lot of time and money in my business and I will definitely recommend it to anyone in the surveillance system business.The only CON: after about six months of use I have problem with powering a camera from it, sometimes on battery power it does not power on the camera so I have to plug the adapter to it and then it comes on and works fine until it decides to do the same again.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Content: Would buy this agian if needed it make finding out the problems so fast and easy i wish i found this sooner

Reviews.Title: Nice tester
Reviews.Author: D Howard
Reviews.Content: Product was what it said it was. works great. We use it on almost ever job we are on. no more guess work.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Qudsia Awan "Sascha"
Reviews.Content: works great!! Helps us in our business thanks! would def recommend this to anyone else who is installing CCTV security cameras!!

Reviews.Title: Evertech CCTV Multi-function Tester PRO-3.5" LCD Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I received the product but it seemed as though the label for the multimeter was not there and I don't know where to find or purchase the multimeter leads.

Reviews.Title: Very nice package
Reviews.Author: WindsorFox "WindsorFox"
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a pretty good piece of equipment for the price. Comes with everything you immediately need and works very well. I'll update when I use the PTZ function, everything else works great.

Reviews.Title: No multimeter
Reviews.Author: Daniel Moreira "La Net Plus"
Reviews.Content: I just received my and I can say for sure... There is no multimeter on this model! I got my because of the pictures and the review saying that he needed the multimeter leads (I figured I could just go to Fry's Electronics and by them), but no. This model does NOT offer the multimeter option at all... Too bad... I'll be returning my and getting something else...
